answerText: American Indian reservations [or Native American reservations][10] America's largest reservation, Navajo Nation, includes this point where Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona, and Utah meet.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | MIT A-Illinois B-Texas A&M A | 9 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] Name these areas that include Red Lake in Minnesota, Standing Rock in South Dakota, and Wind River in Wyoming.
